title: Africa CDC Colours, Palettes, and Themes
text: safer, healthier, integrated prosperous Africa, Member States can efficiently prevent disease transmission, implement surveillance detection, always prepared respond effectively health threats outbreaks. strengthen capacity, capability partnerships Africa’s public health institutions detect respond quickly effectively disease threats outbreaks based science, policy data-driven interventions programmes.

title: Africa CDC Colours, Palettes, and Themes
text: Professionalism Equity Evidence-based decision-making Integrity Excellence

title: Africa CDC Colours, Palettes, and Themes
text: Africa CDC employs three corporate colours: Green, Gold Black.  complemented set five secondary colours.

title: Africa CDC Colours, Palettes, and Themes
text: addition primary secondary colours, set tinted palettes Africa CDC colour available.

title: World Bank Colours, Palettes, and Themes
text: World Bank employs four corporate colours: Blue, Cyan, Black, White.  complemented set fourteen secondary colours.

title: World Bank Colours, Palettes, and Themes
text: addition primary secondary colours, colours can grouped bright palette neutral palette along tinted palettes World Bank colour.

text: World Bank ggplot2 theme function called theme_wb() included paleta package. Following examples can used.

title: Collection of Palettes, Themes, and Theme Components
text: paleta provides providing utilities applying visual identity /branding guidelines various non-governmental organisations, government agencies, United Nations units. Currently, paleta colours, palettes, ggplot2 themes based following organisations’ branding/visual identity guidelines: Africa CDC visual identity guidelines; World Bank visual identity guidelines. Additional colours, palettes, themes provided time.

title: Get named colours vector — get_colour
text: Get named colours vector

title: Get named colours vector — get_colour
code: get_colour(   pattern = NULL,   model = c("hex", "rgb", "cmyk", "pantone"),   named = FALSE )  get_colours(   pattern = NULL,   model = c("hex", "rgb", "cmyk", "pantone"),   named = FALSE )

title: Get named colours vector — get_colour
text: pattern Optional. character value vector use search term. Default NULL case Oxford colours returned. model character vector colour model. Can "rgb", "cmyk", "hex", "pantone". Default "hex". named Logical. output named character value vector? Default FALSE.

title: Get named colours vector — get_colour
text: character value vector colour/s per model specification. named TRUE, returns named character value vector.

what: A ggplot2 theme using Africa CDC fonts, colours, and palettes — theme_acdc_light
title: A ggplot2 theme using Africa CDC fonts, colours, and palettes — theme_acdc_light
text: wrappers theme_paleta() use colours fonts Africa CDC visual identity guidelines.

title: A ggplot2 theme using Africa CDC fonts, colours, and palettes — theme_acdc_light
code: theme_acdc_light(   base_family = set_acdc_font(),   plot_title_family = base_family,   plot_title_colour = acdc_green,   subtitle_family = base_family,   subtitle_colour = acdc_gold,   caption_colour = acdc_gold,   axis_title_colour = acdc_gold,   legend_title_colour = acdc_gold,   legend_text_colour = acdc_gold,   grid_col = acdc_gold,   grid = TRUE,   axis_col = acdc_gold,   axis = FALSE,   ticks = FALSE )  theme_acdc_dark(   base_family = set_acdc_font(),   plot_title_family = base_family,   plot_title_colour = acdc_green,   subtitle_family = base_family,   subtitle_colour = acdc_black,   caption_colour = acdc_black,   axis_title_colour = acdc_black,   legend_title_colour = acdc_black,   legend_text_colour = acdc_black,   plot_background_fill = tint_colour(acdc_gold, 0.2),   grid_col = acdc_green,   grid = TRUE,   axis_col = acdc_green,   axis = FALSE,   ticks = FALSE )

title: A ggplot2 theme using Africa CDC fonts, colours, and palettes — theme_acdc_light
text: base_family Base font family using Africa CDC fonts. Default set Africa CDC font available system via set_acdc_font(). none Africa CDC fonts available, default becomes Noto Sans. plot_title_family Font family use plot title. Default base_family. plot_title_colour Colour plot title text. Default acdc_green. subtitle_family Font family use plot subtitle. Default base_family. subtitle_colour Colour subtitle text. Default acdc_gold. caption_colour Colour caption text. Default acdc_gold. axis_title_colour Colour axis title text. Default acdc_gold. legend_title_colour Colour legend title text. Default NULL. legend_text_colour Colour legend text. Default NULL. grid_col Grid colour. Default acdc_gold. grid Panel grid. Either TRUE, FALSE, combination X (major x grid), x (minor x grid), Y (major y grid), /y (minor y grid). Default TRUE. axis_col Axis colours. Default acdc_gold. axis Add x y axes? TRUE, FALSE, "xy". Default FALSE. ticks Logical. ticks added? Default FALSE. plot_background_fill Fill colour plot background. Default NULL.

title: A ggplot2 theme using Africa CDC fonts, colours, and palettes — theme_acdc_light
text: ggplot2 theme.

title: A ggplot2 theme using Africa CDC fonts, colours, and palettes — theme_acdc_light
text: Africa CDC theme based colours acdc_palettes. primary palette consists three colours: acdc_palettes$acdc_primary. secondary palette consists five colours: acdc_palettes$acdc_secondary.

title: A ggplot2 theme using Africa CDC fonts, colours, and palettes — theme_acdc_light
text: Africa CDC theme uses one two fonts four fonts prescribed Africa CDC visual identity guidelines. fonts (hierarchical order preference) Acumin Pro, Brandon Text, Calibri, /Arial. fonts available user's system used theme. none fonts available user's system, freely downloadable alternative called Noto Sans default fallback font can obtained Google Fonts.

title: A ggplot2 theme using Africa CDC fonts, colours, and palettes — theme_acdc_light
code: if (FALSE) {   ggplot(     data = mtcars,     mapping = aes(       x = factor(vs, levels = c(0, 1), labels = c("v-shaped", "straight")),       fill = factor(cyl))   ) +   geom_bar() +   scale_fill_manual(     name = "Cylinders",     values = acdc_palettes$acdc_secondary   ) +   labs(     title = "Engine shape by number of cylinders",     subtitle = "An example plot for this package",     x = "Engine Shape",     y = "Counts"    ) +    theme_acdc_light() }

what: A generic/base ggplot2 theme for the paleta package — theme_paleta
title: A generic/base ggplot2 theme for the paleta package — theme_paleta
text: generic/base ggplot2 theme template themes paleta package built . theme inspired Bob Rudis' hrbrthemes package drawing heavily typography-centric focus.

title: A generic/base ggplot2 theme for the paleta package — theme_paleta
code: theme_paleta(   base_family = set_paleta_font(),   base_size = 11.5,   plot_title_family = base_family,   plot_title_size = 18,   plot_title_face = "bold",   plot_title_colour = NULL,   plot_title_margin = 10,   subtitle_family = base_family,   subtitle_size = 12,   subtitle_face = "plain",   subtitle_colour = NULL,   subtitle_margin = 15,   strip_text_family = base_family,   strip_text_size = 12,   strip_text_face = "plain",   caption_family = base_family,   caption_size = 9,   caption_face = "italic",   caption_colour = NULL,   caption_margin = 10,   axis_text_size = base_size,   axis_title_family = subtitle_family,   axis_title_size = 9,   axis_title_colour = NULL,   axis_title_face = "plain",   axis_title_just = "rt",   legend_title_family = subtitle_family,   legend_title_colour = NULL,   legend_text_family = subtitle_family,   legend_text_colour = NULL,   plot_margin = ggplot2::margin(30, 30, 30, 30),   plot_background_fill = NULL,   grid_col = NULL,   grid = TRUE,   axis_col = NULL,   axis = FALSE,   ticks = FALSE )

title: A generic/base ggplot2 theme for the paleta package — theme_paleta
text: base_family Base font family using Africa CDC fonts. Default set Africa CDC font available system via set_paleta_font(). base_size Base font size. Default 11.5. plot_title_family Font family use plot title. Default base_family. plot_title_size Plot title text size pts. Default 18. plot_title_face Font face ("plain", "italic", "bold", "bold.italic") plot title. Default "bold". plot_title_colour Colour plot title text. Default acdc_green. plot_title_margin Margin bottom plot title. Default set 10. subtitle_family Font family use plot subtitle. Default base_family. subtitle_size Plot subtitle text size pts. Default 12. subtitle_face Font face ("plain", "italic", "bold", "bold.italic") plot subtitle. Default "plain". subtitle_colour Colour subtitle text. Default NULL use default ggplot2 colour. subtitle_margin Margin bottom plot subtitle. Default set 15. strip_text_family Font family use facet label. Default base_family. strip_text_size Facet label text size pts. Default 12. strip_text_face Font face ("plain", "italic", "bold", "bold.italic") facet label. Default "plain". caption_family Font family use caption text. Default base_family. caption_size Caption text size pts. Default 9. caption_face Font face ("plain", "italic", "bold", "bold.italic") caption text. Default "plain". caption_colour Colour caption text. Default NULL. caption_margin Margin top plot caption text. Default set 10. axis_text_size Axis text size pts. Default base_size. axis_title_family Font family use axis title. Default subtitle_family. axis_title_size Axis title text size pts. Default 9. axis_title_colour Colour axis title text. Default NULL use default ggplot2 colour. axis_title_face Font face ("plain", "italic", "bold", "bold.italic") axis title. Default "plain". axis_title_just Axis title font justification, one "bl" (bottom-left), "m" (middle), "rt" (right-top). Default "rt". legend_title_family Font family use legend title. Default subtitle_family. legend_title_colour Colour legend title text. Default NULL. legend_text_family Font family use legend text. Default subtitle_family. legend_text_colour Colour legend text. Default NULL. plot_margin Plot margins (specify ggplot2::margin()). plot_background_fill Fill colour plot background. Default NULL. grid_col Grid colour. Default NULL. grid Panel grid. Either TRUE, FALSE, combination X (major x grid), x (minor x grid), Y (major y grid), /y (minor y grid). Default TRUE. axis_col Axis colours. Default NULL. axis Add x y axes? TRUE, FALSE, "xy". Default FALSE. ticks Logical. ticks added? Default FALSE.

title: A generic/base ggplot2 theme for the paleta package — theme_paleta
text: function uses either three fonts - Arial Narrow, Noto Sans, Roboto (specific order) - depending available user's system. Arial Narrow generally installed default readily available modern system. available, Noto Sans Roboto - Google fonts - freely downloadable easily installed system. Arial Narrow available system, download install either/Noto Sans /Roboto Google Fonts.

title: A ggplot2 theme using World Bank fonts, colours, and palettes — theme_wb
text: base_family Base font family using World Bank fonts. Default set World Bank font available system via set_wb_font(). none World Bank fonts available, default becomes Noto Sans. plot_title_family Font family use plot title. Default base_family. plot_title_colour Colour plot title text. Default wb_blue. subtitle_family Font family use plot subtitle. Default base_family. subtitle_colour Colour subtitle text. Default wb_cyan. caption_colour Colour caption text. Default wb_cyan. axis_title_colour Colour axis title text. Default wb_cyan. legend_title_colour Colour legend title text. Default NULL. legend_text_colour Colour legend text. Default NULL. grid_col Grid colour. Default wb_cyan. grid Panel grid. Either TRUE, FALSE, combination X (major x grid), x (minor x grid), Y (major y grid), /y (minor y grid). Default TRUE. axis_col Axis colours. Default wb_cyan. axis Add x y axes? TRUE, FALSE, "xy". Default FALSE. ticks Logical. ticks added? Default FALSE.

title: A ggplot2 theme using World Bank fonts, colours, and palettes — theme_wb
text: ggplot2 theme.

title: A ggplot2 theme using World Bank fonts, colours, and palettes — theme_wb
text: Africa CDC theme based colours wb_palettes. primary palette consists four colours: wb_palettes$wb_primary. secondary palette consists fourteen colours: wb_palettes$wb_secondary.

title: A ggplot2 theme using World Bank fonts, colours, and palettes — theme_wb
text: World Bank theme uses two fonts prescribed World Bank visual identity guidelines. fonts (hierarchical order preference) Andes Arial. fonts available user's system used theme. none fonts available user's system, freely downloadable alternative called Noto Sans default fallback font can obtained Google Fonts.

title: A ggplot2 theme using World Bank fonts, colours, and palettes — theme_wb
code: if (FALSE) {   ggplot(     data = mtcars,     mapping = aes(       x = factor(vs, levels = c(0, 1), labels = c("v-shaped", "straight")),       fill = factor(cyl))   ) +   geom_bar() +   scale_fill_manual(     name = "Cylinders",     values = wb_palettes$wb_secondary   ) +   labs(     title = "Engine shape by number of cylinders",     subtitle = "An example plot for this package",     x = "Engine Shape",     y = "Counts"    ) +    theme_wb() }
